name: Ten Tackles - Post Game Jam
description:
How to play:  

WASD - To move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Swap between dimensions

This prototype has been made for Video Games Lab Game Jam 2021. You control a flying creature and have to defend yourself against your enemies. Some enemies will exist in alternate realities and your attacks wont reach them, but beware they can still attack you. Swapping between the alternate dimensions is key to defending yourself properly.

I just wanted to create tentacles and procedural animations! So I had to then think of an idea that fits my whims.  And since it's my first time participating alone, I wanted to focus more on visuals but I am no artist 😅

Credits:
  • Font - https://ggbot.itch.io/neon-sans-font
  • Crosshair - https://kenney-assets.itch.io/crosshair-pack
  • All the other assets has been made by me but inspired by https://blackthornprod-games.itch.io/ and his youtube videos.
UPDATES: 
  • Swap sprites when changing dimensions 
  • Restart button
  • Increased light intensity
